'Complicated' is an album by Country recording artist Tanya Tucker. Instead of
longtime producer Jerry Crutchfield, Tucker employed Gregg Brown to produce the
album. One track hit the Top Ten in the Billboard Top Country Singles charts,
the #9 "Little Things." "Ridin' Out the Heartache" was the only other single to
chart at #45. The album reached #15 on the Country Albums chart.
